data.md:MetaData: Physical oceanography during POSEIDON cruise POS363 in March 2008 in Black Sea

Conductivity, Temperature, Depth (CTD) measurements were obtained with sea-bird SBE-9 vertical profiler, mounted on the Rosette, at 26 CTD stations during the International research cruise R/V POSEIDON, POS 363, in March 2008 in the North-Western shelf area of the Black Sea.
Cruise report POS363, RV "Poseidon", March 7 to 25 2008, Varna/Varna
